sentences.en: Do you understand all the terms of the lease?

sentences.cn: 昨天他在租约上签了字.

sentences.en: He took up a 10 year lease on the house at Rossie Priory.
sentences.cn: 他签了一份10年租约，租下了罗茜大宅的房子。

sentences.en: He will need more grazing land and perhaps La Prade could lease him a few acres.
sentences.cn: 他将需要更多牧场，也许拉普拉德可以租几英亩地给他。

sentences.en: I’m interested in leasing your cottage.
sentences.cn: 我有兴趣租下你的小屋。

sentences.en: Larry's landlord threatened not to renew his lease.
sentences.cn: 拉里的房东威胁说不跟他续租。

sentences.en: Tenants remain liable if they pass on their lease.
sentences.cn: 如果房客将房子转租，他们仍承担责任。

sentences.en: That long holiday has given me a new lease of life.
sentences.cn: 那个长假使我重新变得生气勃勃.

sentences.en: The landlord refused to renew his lease.
sentences.cn: 房东拒绝和他续签租约。

sentences.en: The lease entitles the holder to use the buildings and any land attached thereto.
sentences.cn: 本租约持有人有权使用此建筑物以及所附属的土地。

sentences.en: The lease on their London flat runs out in a few months.
sentences.cn: 他们在伦敦公寓的租契再过几个月就期满了.

sentences.en: The operation has given me a new lease of life.
Theater owners lease films from film distributors.
sentences.cn: 剧院老板从电影发行商处租电影放映。

sentences.en: to take out a lease on a house
When does the lease of the house run out?
sentences.cn: 这房子的租约何时到期?

sentences.en: When the lease ends, the property reverts to the freeholder.
sentences.cn: 租期结束后，该房产会归还给其终身所有者。

sentences.en: When the lease ran out the family moved to Campigny.
sentences.cn: 租约到期后，这家人搬到了坎皮格尼。

words.tran_cn: 专线；一线路（指一电话线路每天 24 小时地连通两地）
租用（lease的过去式和过去分词）
租约；租期；[租赁]租赁物；租赁权

phrases.phrase: a new lease of (或 北美
phrases.tran_cn: 充满生气的新的生活阶段，（修复后）重新使用阶段
改进某人状况或前景的机会
批地契约；土地批租；土地契约
租借购买，分期付款购买
经营性租赁；维护性租赁

trans.tran_cn: 租约，租契，租赁物，租赁权
trans.tran_en: a legal agreement which allows you to use a building, car etc for a period of time, in return for rent
to use a building, car etc under a lease
to use a building, car etc under a lease
